page.title: 16INCOMERS TO CARBOST
page.content: People choose to come and live in our area for varied reasons.Often they are retiring.We asked one such couple to explain why they chose here. "We first visited Skye in summer 1962,spending a holiday at Talisker,4 miles from Carbost.This we so much enjoyed that we continued coming back every year for the next 13 years!By that time my husband was about to retire and so in 1975 we returned once more,this time to stay in our own house which we had built. We settled here because we had begun to feel quite at home in this part of Skye and knew that we could follow the leisure activities we both enjoy-sailing,fishing and hill-walking.We have made many friends and now would not like to live anywhere else!"
